1.4.5.commit_description: Limit to x86/x86_64 architecture as upstream Crafty is still not compatible with non-x86 architectures.

1.4.4.commit_description: Fix building with Clang on FreeBSD.

1.4.3.commit_description: Fix Crafty build on Linux when Clang isn't available since its upstream makefile was defaulting to Clang, so add GCC check.

1.4.2.commit_description: Update download link for Windows, fix build on FreeBSD/Clang.

1.4.0.commit_description: Updated against Crafty 25.2 upstream, switch to reporting nodes per second.

1.3.1.commit_description: Update CFLAGS handling, update download links

1.3.0.commit_description: Update against Crafty 23.4 upstream. Plus makefile changes.
